english.segment1: I thank the Lord for what, for what He's done in us. I thank the Lord for His love. I thank the Lord for what He's gonna do in us. From the Heavens above. I thank the Lord for the smile that He's put on my face. I thank the Lord for His grace. I thank the Lord for the joy that He has given to me. Cuz now I know that I am really set free
english.segment2: CHORUS: Everybody Everybody. Everybody praise the Lord. Everybody praise the Lord
